name: Inherently Unjust Destiny
descHash:
With the final card revealed, despondency, rage, acceptance, and sangfroid... A cascade of emotions drops onto the faces of his opponents.
"Now that we're all here, why don't we spice things up a bit?"
He puts in all his chips. Those who have cut their losses leave the table, cursing profanities and secretly hoping that he would lose.

Victories, reputation, fortune... He cares not for any of that. Instead, he's enthralled only by those moments that make his very life quiver —
After all, hell is but one choice away from heaven.

The chips are cast, sorrow fills the air, and the illusory sense of satisfaction dissipates in an instant when the dust finally settles.
"All or nothing, I have not the luxury of choice..."

29328.name: Credit
29328.desc: This currency, used by the Interastral Peace Corporation to settle accounts with its customers, is now widely accepted as the hard currency for space travel.
29328.lore: "People run around fighting and trading for numbers in a terminal, but the truly precious cannot be bought."

549210.name: Tatters of Thought
549210.desc: A memoria fragment of fleeting thought. Crude material used for enhancement.
549210.lore:
Within the Memory Zone, thousands of thoughts flutter like dust. Broken thoughts accumulate, serving as nourishment and components for memes.

"A fleeting thought may dissipate into thin air or amass into obsessions."
comeFrom: Dropped by enemies in Divergent Universe

589817.name: Crystal Meteorites
589817.desc: The crystals that separate from the Amber Lord's body when THEY swing the celestial hammer. Used to level up Traces moderately for Preservation characters.
589817.lore:
People only become aware of the fact that Qlipoth has swung THEIR hammer again from the two phenomena invariably detected afterward: An enormous burst of intense gravitational waves, and "starquakes." Like a gift from the Preservation, the crystal meteorites dash across the dark sky and announce the beginning of a new Era.

"The Genius Society is audacious enough to declare the Amber Lord as the slowest Aeon in the Cosmos, but none of these people have ever successfully observed the entire process of Qlipoth swinging the celestial hammer."

633151.name: Fragments of Impression
633151.desc: A memoria fragment of profound impression. Normal material used for enhancement.
633151.lore:
Within the Memory Zone, the form of memories float as fleeting glimmers of light, and only profound and memorable fragments can condense it crystals.

"Memory is not a mere replication of past sensations, but a reconstruction of past impressions."
comeFrom: Memory Zone Meme at Equilibrium Level 2 or higher
Dropped by enemies in Divergent Universe

673758.name: Divine Amber
673758.desc: The amber that rains from the Amber Lord's body when THEY swing the celestial hammer. Used to level up Traces significantly for Preservation characters.
673758.lore:
Although Pier Point sent out Meteor Hunters and intercepted most of the meteors, the brightest one among all these shooting stars will always only be seen by the chosen one.

"It is a part of the divine body of the Aeon, albeit an insignificant one. Only the chosen ones, with their minds as steadfast as cornerstones and having endured challenges and hardships, can chisel apart this amber and unleash the crystalized light within."

694487.name: Refined Aether
694487.desc: Enhancement material for Light Cones, provides <nobr>6000</nobr> Light Cone EXP.
694487.lore:
A canister of aether that has been extracted and distilled using special procedures.

"The Garden looks forward to recreating a past glory, but it is a 'past glory' selected by them. Do you understand?"

694488.name: Condensed Aether
694488.desc: Enhancement material for Light Cones, provides <nobr>2000</nobr> Light Cone EXP.
694488.lore:
A can of Aether refined through special techniques.

"Handle with care, do not drop or place pressure upon it. If damages and leaks occur, please refer to chapter II of the Leak Disaster Response Manual for emergency response."

694489.name: Sparse Aether
694489.desc: Enhancement material for Light Cones, provides <nobr>500</nobr> Light Cone EXP.
694489.lore:
An imaginary substance that shouldn't exist in reality. The basic material to create Light Cones.
The images contained in the Light Cones become clearer when infused with this substance.

"I see, so this is the supposed 'memoria' of the Garden of Recollection. No wonder the Memokeepers can set off on galactic voyages with memories."

717092.name: Shards of Desires
717092.desc: A memoria fragment of obsessive desires. Advanced material used for enhancement.
717092.lore:
Within the Memory Zone, memoria of desires develops ceaselessly. It absorbs thoughts and impressions, nurtures magic mirrors of desires, and reflects the eerie shadows of memetic entities.

"Memory points to the past, while desire points to the future. To seek desires from memory will cause dreams to become inverted, and inner demons will naturally be born."
comeFrom: Memory Zone Meme at Equilibrium Level 4 or higher
Dropped by enemies in Divergent Universe

874344.name: Scattered Stardust
874344.desc: The dust that falls from the Amber Lord's body when they swing the divine hammer. Used to level up Traces slightly for Preservation characters.
874344.lore:
The guards at Pier Point have never left their posts on Qlipoth's orbit, simply waiting for a miracle that only occurs once in decades or even centuries — How stardust splutters up like countless raindrops the moment the giant hammer falls.

"The stardust are simply insignificant dust to the Amber Lord, but to us, every speck of it contains the essence of Preservation."

skill.name: All-In
skill.descHash: Increases the wearer's DEF by #1[i]%. When the wearer provides a Shield to an ally, the wearer's CRIT DMG increases by #2[i]%, lasting for #3[i] turn(s). When the wearer's follow-up attack hits an enemy target, there is a #4[i]% base chance to increase the DMG taken by the attacked enemy target by #5[f1]%, lasting for #6[i] turn(s).
